original_text: I will punish them because they have not obeyed my Law. I will destroy the altars at Bethel. The horns of the altar will break off and they will fall to the ground.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘의 모든 죄를 보응하는 날에 벧엘의 제단들을 벌하여 그 제단의 뿔들을 꺾어 땅에 떨어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: because they have not obeyed my Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 율법을 순종하지 않았기 때문이니라

sentences.original_text: I will destroy the altars at Bethel
The horns of the altar will break off
and they will fall to the ground
